bool jma::createTempFile ( std::string &  tempName  )  [inline]

Create a unique temporary file and output its file name.

It is commented out as the temporary file is replaced with memory.

Parameters:
tempName the string to save the temporary file name
Returns:
true for success and tempName is set as the temporary file name. false for fail and tempName is not modified.
